iep_goals: Complete modified academic coursework leading to certificate of completion with 80% success rate
Demonstrate transition readiness skills for post-secondary employment with 75% independence
accommodations: Alternate assessment based on alternate achievement standards
Functional curriculum with life skills emphasis
Job coaching and supported work experiences
learning_styles: learns through repetition and practical application
responds well to positive reinforcement and encouragement

interviews.parent: Parent wants Maria to develop job skills and hopes she can work in a supportive environment after graduation.
interviews.teacher: Maria is hardworking and takes pride in completing tasks. She's participating in a school-to-work program at a local business.

observations.psychologist: Significant cognitive and physical limitations with strengths in social motivation and task persistence. Requires ongoing support systems.
